mapper.sql: id, project_id, create_time, del_flag, operator, operator_ip, operator_time, approve, examine, approve_opinion, examine_opinion
mapper.insert: insert into predesign_report (id, project_id, create_time, del_flag, operator, operator_ip, operator_time, approve, examine, approve_opinion, examine_opinion) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into predesign_report
id,
project_id,
create_time,
del_flag,
operator,
operator_ip,
operator_time,
approve,
examine,
approve_opinion,
examine_opinion,

mapper.update:
update predesign_report
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examine = #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examine_opinion = #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update predesign_report set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, examine = #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, examine_opinion = #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select project_name,build_year,construction_unit.name,a.* from (select * from predesign_report where del_flag=0 and approve=1) as a LEFT JOIN project_store on a.project_id=project_store.id LEFT JOIN construction_unit on construction_unit.id=project_store.constru_unit_id ORDER BY approve

select pr.*,project_name,build_year,cu.name from predesign_report pr,construction_unit cu,project_store ps where pr.del_flag=0 and ps.id=pr.project_id and cu.id=ps.constru_unit_id=#{unitId} and ps.del_flag=0 ORDER BY pr.approve
